passages.text:
You are in the main square of the town of Fortune, the streets are pretty much deserted, except for a few of the townspeople.

To your left, is the saloon, The Crazy Uncle.
To your right, the County Jail, the Sheriff's name is Bill Barney.
In front of you, is the Town Hall, where Mayor Jeffrey H. Hann keeps his office; and the Honerable Judge James West resides over the County Court.
Directly behind you, the train station, which you can use to exit The Town of Fortune (THIS WILL EXIT THE GAME).

[[Enter Saloon ->Saloon]]
[[Enter Town Hall ->Town Hall]] 
[[Enter the Jail ->Jail]] 
[[Leave Town ->Train Station]]
passages.name: Town Square

passages.text:
Patrons are seated at the bar and several tables. Most are drinking beer from glasses, but several are 'enjoying' the locally distilled whiskey.

You can talk to the Bartender or Fats.

[[Fats->Fats]]
[[Bartender->Bartender Dialogue]]
[[Leave->Town Square]]
passages.name: Saloon

passages.text:
The Mayor's Secretary is seated at her desk to the left of the entrance, the door to his office is to the right.

Across from the entrance, through a set of double doors is the county court.

[[Enter Office->Mayor's Office]]
[[Enter Courtroom->Courtroom]]
[[Leave->Town Square]]
passages.name: Town Hall

passages.text:
The county jail, the Sheriff is holding a local drunk until he sobers up.

[[Sheriff->Sheriff]]
[[Leave->Town Square]]
passages.name: Jail

passages.text:
Input 'q' to exit the game, or return to town.
[[Return to Town ->Town Square]]
passages.name: Train Station

passages.text:
*Buuuuuuuuuuurrrrrp* H-Hey strangerrr! I's is Fats! But most people call me Fats! Hehe, oops! 

Hey, Buddy... Do you know where Lennie is? He went out to crack a piss a few hours ago, and hasn't come back. 

[[Jail->Fats is Grateful]]
passages.name: Fats

passages.text:
HAHAHA what a moron! Thanks for the help stranger. You know, if you keep helping people like me, folks' opinion a you'll raise! This town has everything a fella suchs yourselfs could hope to get from the world.

[[I'm just a drifter->Fats is Disappointed]]
[[I'm going to run for Mayor->Fats is Excited]]

links.name: I'm going to run for Mayor

passages.name: Fats is Grateful

passages.text:
Oh okay, well then safe travels I guess... If you change your mind and decide you want to <u>Make something of your life</u> then come back and talk to me again!

[[Leave->Saloon]]
passages.name: Fats is Disappointed

passages.text:
You'll need some money ifn you plan on seeking political office. Hmmmmm...

I GOT IT! MY BOY LENNIE CAN HELP YOU OUT! Let's go to the jail and get him.

[[OK->Lennie]]
passages.name: Fats is Excited

passages.text:
Can I help you, Stranger? I'm the Sheriff around these parts, name's Barney, Bill Barney.

Listen, I don't mean any insult partner, but if there's nothing you need, I'll have to kindly ask you to leave.

[[Leave->Town Square]]
passages.name: Sheriff

passages.text:
*He's asleep on the bench inside of a cell which takes up about a third of the room*

*Fats bangs his fist on the cell bars*

"Wha?! Mommy I don't wanna go to school! Oh, it's you Fats, and who's this Stranger you've got with you?"

"This is my new friend, he helped me find you... We owe him, so I thought you could let him in on that thing you're working on. This guy's gonna be Mayor of Fortune, I can tell!"

"Oh that... are you sure you're cut out for it?"

[[For what?->Lennie is sober]]
passages.name: Lennie

passages.text: You and Fats follow Lennie on foot for a few hours, during your journey you discuss topics such as politics and pop culture. Finally, you come upon a river and not far off is a small one room shack. "I'm a prospector, and these hills are rich with gold, more than any one man could know what to do with." "Since you helped me find Lennie, we decided to help you get a job!" If you return to town, you will not be able to come back, so work here for a few days at least! What do you say? [[Let's get started->Payday]] [[Leave->Town Square]]
passages.name: Lennie is sober

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Payday
